WO-IMPL-FINANCE-HARDENING.title: Finance & Ledger Architecture Hardening
WO-IMPL-FINANCE-HARDENING.instruction_raw: Implement the Finance & Ledger hardening spec to resolve 5 critical/pending technical debts (M2 Negative Balance, Reserve Crunch, Dust Settlement, Implicit Registry Lookups, and Magic Base Rate).

WO-IMPL-ARCH-STABILITY.title: Architecture & Core Stability Hardening
WO-IMPL-ARCH-STABILITY.instruction_raw: Decouple SimulationState using Protocol-based TickContexts and implement atomic firm spawning to resolve 4 High-priority technical debts.

WO-IMPL-ECON-TUNING.title: Economy & Behavioral Tuning
WO-IMPL-ECON-TUNING.instruction_raw: Tuned firm pricing to prevent extinction and integrate 'hidden_talent' into agents/DTOs to resolve 3 High-priority behavioral technical debts.
